name: Mini Adventuring Squad
description:
An adventuring party of three finds themselves in a dungeon, seeking treasures. With their unique skills and limitations, you must use snake-like movement to traverse a dungeon filled with tricks and traps.

Control with arrow keys or wasd, for movement, and spacebar or x, for special actions

The PuzzleScript link, to be able to view the game code, is available at https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=1d1601e9667f50e2ae4d4b49533f7921.
